body:
### 

Enlist is an open source and free volunteer management application, and is designed to be used by any organization that needs to:

* Manage and communicate with volunteers
* Manage events at which volunteers are needed
* Allow volunteers to sign up to participate at events
* Track volunteer participation and reward points
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
name: Enlist App
tagline: Enlist is an open source and free application that aims to help non-profits organize volunteers, track volunteer hours and management volunteer rewards.
